dict.acceptation: （主持会议的）主席；委员长；（委员会的）委员长；（公司等的）董事长；

sent.orig: Chairman Mao Zedong, Vice-chairman Liu Shaoqi, Enlai and Chairman Zhu De wrote messages for our hospital.
sent.trans: 毛泽东主席、刘少奇副主席、周恩来总理、朱德委员长亲笔为医院题词。

sent.orig: Chairman of hemp hemp chairman week surnames hemp, in small town assist branch does chairman.
sent.trans: 麻会长周伟麻会长姓麻，在小镇个协分会做会长。

sent.orig: The chairman and deputy chairman shall elected by more than half of all the supervisors.
sent.trans: 监事会主席和副主席由全体监事过半数选举产生。

sent.orig: The 9th CPPCC vice-president \CDNCA central honorary Chairman Guoquan and Board Chairman Zheng Yuanbao.
sent.trans: 第九届全国政协副主席、民建中央名誉主席万国权与郑元豹。

sent.orig: Xu, vice chairman NPC Standing Committee to serve as honorary chairman of the Promotion of text.
sent.trans: 全国人大常委会副委员长许嘉璐亲自担任文促会名誉主席。
